column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A group of four suspects assaulted a foreign man in an attempt to steal his phone.------The unnamed foreigner
column4: who was riding a bicycle at the time of the incident
column5: fought back and retook his phone
column6: forcing the suspects to flee.------ The incident occurred at 1:10 am on March 27
column8: along Sothearos Boulevard in Chey Chumneas district
column9: Daun Penh district.------According to the source
column10: at the time of the incident
column11: the foreigner managed to knock some suspects off a motorcycle after the snatch attempt
column12: causing them to run off empty handed.------After the incident
column13: the foreigner waited for the police and filed complaint
column14: so that authorities could search for the suspects. ------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/53286
